mapper.sql: ID, RECONCILIATION_OBJ, WORKER, SALES_ORDER_NO, CONSUMER, BUILDING_USER, CONSIGNOR_NAME, SYSTEM_ITEM, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_SUM, RECEIVED_PAYMENTS_SUM, PERFORMANCE_GUARANTEE, BACK_LIB_SUM, SPECIAL_HANDING_SUM, UNDELIVERY_SUM, UNSETTLE_ACCOUNTS_SUM, INVOICE_CLASSFICATION, INVOICE_NO, FINISHED_INVOICE_SUM, AGENCY_AMOUNT, PROFIT_AMOUNT, CHECKED_ACCOUNT_REMARKS, FINAL_DELIVERY_DATE, CURRENCY, EXCHANGE_RATE, NET_AMOUNT_OPERATOR, NET_AMOUNT_OPERATE_DATE, FR_ISSUE_ID, NET_AMOUNT_IS_LIVE
mapper.select:
select
from EB_NET_AMOUNT
NET_AMOUNT_IS_LIVE = 1
AND WORKER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{worker}),'%')
AND SALES_ORDER_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{salesOrderNo}),'%')
AND BUILDING_USER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{buildingUser}),'%')
AND FR_ISSUE_ID = #{frIssueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND RECONCILIATION_OBJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{reconciliationObj}),'%')
order by ORDER_DATE DESC
select ID,distinct(RECONCILIATION_OBJ) from EB_NET_AMOUNT where NET_AMOUNT_IS_LIVE = 1 and RECONCILIATION_OBJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{param_s}),'%')
select count(ID) from EB_NET_AMOUNT where NET_AMOUNT_IS_LIVE = 1 and FR_ISSUE_ID = #{issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into EB_NET_AMOUNT (ID, RECONCILIATION_OBJ, WORKER, SALES_ORDER_NO, CONSUMER, BUILDING_USER, CONSIGNOR_NAME, SYSTEM_ITEM, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_SUM, RECEIVED_PAYMENTS_SUM, PERFORMANCE_GUARANTEE, BACK_LIB_SUM, SPECIAL_HANDING_SUM, UNDELIVERY_SUM, UNSETTLE_ACCOUNTS_SUM, INVOICE_CLASSFICATION, INVOICE_NO, FINISHED_INVOICE_SUM, AGENCY_AMOUNT, PROFIT_AMOUNT, CHECKED_ACCOUNT_REMARKS, FINAL_DELIVERY_DATE, CURRENCY, EXCHANGE_RATE, NET_AMOUNT_OPERATOR, NET_AMOUNT_OPERATE_DATE, FR_ISSUE_ID, NET_AMOUNT_IS_LIVE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reconciliationObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{receivedPaymentsSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{performanceGuarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backLibSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{specialHandingSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{undeliverySum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{unsettleAccountsSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{invoiceClassfication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishedInvoiceSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{agencyAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{profitAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{checkedAccountRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalDeliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchangeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{netAmountOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{netAmountOperateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frIssueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netAmountIsLive,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update EB_NET_AMOUNT
RECONCILIATION_OBJ = #{reconciliationObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKER = #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_ORDER_NO = #{salesOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSUMER = #{consumer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUILDING_USER = #{buildingUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSIGNOR_NAME = #{consignorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSTEM_ITEM = #{systemItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_SUM = #{orderSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
RECEIVED_PAYMENTS_SUM = #{receivedPaymentsSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PERFORMANCE_GUARANTEE = #{performanceGuarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_LIB_SUM = #{backLibSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SPECIAL_HANDING_SUM = #{specialHandingSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
UNDELIVERY_SUM = #{undeliverySum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
UNSETTLE_ACCOUNTS_SUM = #{unsettleAccountsSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
INVOICE_CLASSFICATION = #{invoiceClassfication,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_NO = #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINISHED_INVOICE_SUM = #{finishedInvoiceSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
AGENCY_AMOUNT = #{agencyAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PROFIT_AMOUNT = #{profitAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CHECKED_ACCOUNT_REMARKS = #{checkedAccountRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_DELIVERY_DATE = #{finalDeliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXCHANGE_RATE = #{exchangeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
NET_AMOUNT_OPERATOR = #{netAmountOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NET_AMOUNT_OPERATE_DATE = #{netAmountOperateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FR_ISSUE_ID = #{frIssueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NET_AMOUNT_IS_LIVE = #{netAmountIsLive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update EB_NET_AMOUNT set RECONCILIATION_OBJ = #{reconciliationObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKER = #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_ORDER_NO = #{salesOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSUMER = #{consumer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILDING_USER = #{buildingUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSIGNOR_NAME = #{consignorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_ITEM = #{systemItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_SUM = #{orderSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, RECEIVED_PAYMENTS_SUM = #{receivedPaymentsSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PERFORMANCE_GUARANTEE = #{performanceGuarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_LIB_SUM = #{backLibSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SPECIAL_HANDING_SUM = #{specialHandingSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, UNDELIVERY_SUM = #{undeliverySum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, UNSETTLE_ACCOUNTS_SUM = #{unsettleAccountsSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, INVOICE_CLASSFICATION = #{invoiceClassfication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_NO = #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINISHED_INVOICE_SUM = #{finishedInvoiceSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, AGENCY_AMOUNT = #{agencyAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PROFIT_AMOUNT = #{profitAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CHECKED_ACCOUNT_REMARKS = #{checkedAccountRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINAL_DELIVERY_DATE = #{finalDeliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCHANGE_RATE = #{exchangeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, NET_AMOUNT_OPERATOR = #{netAmountOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NET_AMOUNT_OPERATE_DATE = #{netAmountOperateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FR_ISSUE_ID = #{frIssueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NET_AMOUNT_IS_LIVE = #{netAmountIsLive,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
